SELECT my_view.provide_dep_name,my_view.already_pro_nums, my_view.rescinded_nums FROM (SELECT thd.provide_dep,pd.name AS provide_dep_name, COUNT(already_pro.history_id) AS already_pro_nums, COUNT(rescinded.history_id) AS rescinded_nums FROM t_history_data thd LEFT JOIN pub_organ pd ON thd.provide_dep = pd.code AND pd.STATUS='1'
LEFT JOIN(SELECT tho.history_id FROM t_history_operate tho WHERE tho.state in ('01')
AND tho.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tho.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tho.history_id)already_pro on thd.history_id=already_pro.history_id
LEFT JOIN(SELECT tho.history_id FROM t_history_operate tho WHERE tho.state in ('02')
AND tho.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tho.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tho.history_id)rescinded on thd.history_id=rescinded.history_id WHERE 1=1
AND thd.provide_dep = #{provideDep}
GROUP BY thd.provide_dep, pd.name) my_view
order by ${sidx} ${sord}
